text:
e="preserve">Terence Frisby (28 November 1932 – 23 April 2020) was a British playwright, actor, stage director and producer. He was best known as the author of the play "There's a Girl in My Soup". He also helped write the screenplay for the movie version of the play. Frisby was born in London.
Frisby died on 23 April 2020, aged 87.

annotations.surface_form: There's a Girl in My Soup
